column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello CJ M. - Thank you for your review. First
column2: as we do with all negative Yelp reviews
column3: I would like to apologize for your experiences at our restaurant. I appreciate and welcome all constructive criticism as it helps us improve our station. To that end
column4: I would like to ask you for some follow-up information so that I might get to the bottom of these issues. In doing so
column5: I hope to address each of your points to the best of my ability.
